mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME FROM JAVA.GOOGLE WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT AUTH_ID, AUTH_NAME FROM JAVA.AUTH WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_ID, AUTH.AUTH_NAME, AUTH_MAPPING.USER_ID, GOOGLE.NAME, AUTH_MAPPING.REG_DATE, to_char(AUTH_MAPPING.MOD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mi:ss') as MOD_DATE FROM JAVA.AUTH_MAPPING INNER JOIN JAVA.GOOGLE ON (AUTH_MAPPING.USER_ID = GOOGLE.ID AND GOOGLE.DEL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN JAVA.AUTH ON (AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_ID = AUTH.AUTH_ID AND AUTH.DEL_YN = 'N') WHERE AUTH_MAPPING.DEL_YN = 'N' AND AUTH_MAPPING.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JAVA.GOOGLE (ID, IMG, EMAIL, NAME) VALUES (#{id}, #{img}, #{email}, #{name})
